name: 2024 6th International Conference on Virtual Reality and Image Processing
content: Publication: All the registered and presented papers will be published in Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
organizers: University of Saint Joseph, Macao, SAR China and University of Macau, China (Macau)
